achievement.double_trouble.description: Push an enemy using a Punchton to the front of another Punchton.
achievement.double_trouble.name: Double Trouble
achievement.ghost_buster.description: Defeat a ghost without illuminating it for any time.
achievement.ghost_buster.name: Ghost Buster
achievement.return_to_sender.description: Defeat a ghast using a fire charge.
achievement.return_to_sender.name: Return to Sender
achievement.rickroll_drown.description: Make a zombie without boat walk into water and sink.
achievement.rickroll_drown.name: Never gonna let you drown
advice.collect_money.1: Collect gems to purchase COOL stuff!
advice.place_on_statue: You cannot place contraptions on statues
advice.starshard_tutorial.0: Left-click the Starshard to select it!
advice.starshard_tutorial.5: Now defeat the Iron Helmet Zombie!
advice.trigger_tutorial.1: Click the ME Panel to select Trigger!
advice.trigger_tutorial.6: Place TNT, then it will be instantly triggered!
advice.trigger_tutorial.8: Instant triggering can only be used on consumable contraptions.
advice.trigger_tutorial.9: If you want to swap these 2 actions, you can change it in Settings.
advice.tutorial.0: Left-click a blueprint to choose a contraption!
advice.tutorial.1: Click the lawn to place a contraption!
advice.tutorial.13: Mine TNTs can blow up enemies after arming itself!
advice.tutorial.14: Blow up the Iron Helmet Zombie with Mine TNT!
advice.tutorial.16: Finally, the pickaxe can dig out placed contraptions!
advice.tutorial.17: Try to dig out all contraptions!
advice.tutorial.4: Collect enough ME to place contraptions!
advice.tutorial.5: Defeat the zombie with your Dispenser!
advice.tutorial.8: Furnaces can provide you additional redstone!
advice.tutorial.9: The more Furnaces you have, the faster you can build!
archive.doremy_suffering: (Doremy holds her head in her hands in agony)
archive.goto_dream: (Steve and Villager went to Dream world.)
archive.have_enough_money_question: Have enough money to buy this?
archive.money_insufficent: If you have not enough money
blueprint.add_pearl.name: Add Pearl
blueprint.lengthen_board.name: Lengthen Board
blueprint.return_pearl.name: Return Pearl
character.crazy_villager.description:
Steve's caregiver since he was young, suddenly went crazy a few years ago and couldn't be understood.
Often discussed with Steve about Gensokyo, and finally embarked on the journey today.
character.crazy_villager.description_hea: A crazy villager wearing a white outfit who lives together with Steve. His name is Ahmed Dave.
character.crazy_villager.name: Villager
character.doremy.description:
Tapir Youkai which administrating this dream world, can observe, change or consume others' dreams.
Was shocked by Steve and Villager with physical bodies, but seems she's seen some interesting dreams from Steve.
character.doremy.description_header: Doremy Sweet is the administrator of dream world, and managing everyone's dreams.
character.doremy.name: Doremy
character.orant.description:
She doesn't want you to know things about her - she has always been introversive.
Just keep in mind that she is a friend of souls and fear.
character.orant.description_header: Orant is a soul sorceress, can control fear and souls.
character.orant.name: Orant
character.steve.name: Steve
chat.dream.1.0.1: This is Doremy's territory. Be careful not to meet that tapir!
chat.dream.1.0.2: By the way, this is daylight, so some of your contraptions cannot be used!
chat.dream.1.0.3: For example, Small Dispensers, Moonlight Sensors, and even Soul Forges!
chat.dream.1.0.4: Also, there is a swimming pool! But don't think you can swim here! You can't put contraptions directly on the pool!
chat.dream.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Intro
chat.dream.2.0.0: So...You came here using a key, and going to Gensokyo, right?
chat.dream.2.0.1: I can let you pass, however there's some difficulties now.
chat.dream.2.0.3: Dream world is invaded by some blocky bugs, and that causes the environment is not very stable.
chat.dream.2.0.4: if we clear these bugs, maybe you can successfully go there.
chat.dream.2.0.5: Debugging right? We just have a programmer! Go neighbor!
chat.dream.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Intro
chat.dream.3.0.0: Did you noticed? Sometimes, the sky suddenly turns to dark! Though it's only for a while.
chat.dream.3.0.2: However, even the deepest darkness cannot stand on our way if we have lights!
chat.dream.3.0.3: Try to carry some glowing contraptions!...If necessary.
chat.dream.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Intro
chat.dream.6.0.0: Ever tried playing breakout in a dream?
chat.dream.6.0.2: But instead of hitting bricks, it's zombies!
chat.dream.6.0.3: And instead of balls of steel, it's Occlut Balls!
chat.dream.6.0.4: And instead of ME, it's YOU!
chat.dream.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Intro
chat.dream.7.0.0: Doremy is fine, She's just fainted.
chat.dream.7.0.1: However, she seems to be under a curse...I am still finding more informations about the curse.
chat.dream.7.0.2: Besides, there's something slowly taking her life away, the situation is not optimistic.
chat.dream.7.0.3: Anyway, ask her when she wakes up!
chat.dream.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Intro
chat.dream.8.0.7: We...Can we really watch this happen...?
chat.dream.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Intro
chat.dream.9.0.0: I've done my best to lure that demon to us. Be careful.
chat.dream.9.0.1: I know. Let's just get this over with.
chat.dream.9.0.2: <color=blue>(...I said to defeat that nightmare, but I have little confidence in my heart.)</color>
chat.dream.9.0.3: <color=blue>(but for Miss Doremy, I have to do the same...)</color>
chat.dream.9.0.4: This is all I can do. Don't put your life in danger, ok?
chat.dream.9.0.5: Wait, what's that white spider over there?
chat.dream.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Intro
chat.dream.11.0.2: I don't know what Nightmare is, and don't know what it can do. But I know, you must keep clearheaded.
chat.dream.11.0.3: We must finish the battle as soon as possible. Our time is running out.
chat.dream.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Intro
chat.dream_map.1.0.0: I have to say, why did another physical body guy enter the dream world... Also there's a blocky big nosed guy.
chat.dream_map.1.0.1: She's certainly not talking about me!
chat.dream_map.1.0.2: And how did you get here with physical bodies, you want to go to the Lunar Capital too?
chat.dream_map.1.0.3: Lunar Capital? No, but the reality of Gensokyo!
chat.dream_map.1.0.5: See, there are lots of monsters like zombies in your dream world isn't it?
chat.dream_map.1.0.6: Ah, that's true...But what's of your business?
chat.dream_map.1.0.7: We came here for clearing these monsters!
chat.dream_map.1.0.9: Here, neighbor. Proof yourself to her!
chat.dream_map.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Map
chat.dream_map.2.0.0: Seems you are great at this, can clear those spiders by such a fast speed.
chat.dream_map.2.0.1: Well, looks like I haven't introduced myself.
chat.dream_map.2.0.11: Steve, and Villager, right? We welcome you.
chat.dream_map.2.0.2: I'm Doremy Sweet, the administrator of this dream world...But looks like you already knows both that and things about Gensokyo.
chat.dream_map.2.0.3: Sure! We came for there from the beginning!
chat.dream_map.2.0.4: Oh, My name's Villager, Just call me Crazy Villager! This is my neighbor, called...
chat.dream_map.2.0.5: Steve right? I have heard your name.
chat.dream_map.2.0.6: You have appeared in dreams of someone in Gensokyo. The appearance in the dreams is the same as yours.
chat.dream_map.2.0.7: Wow, you have a girlfriend in Gensokyo actually! Which Youkai?
chat.dream_map.2.0.8: No! What made you think so?!
chat.dream_map.2.0.9: Whoa, you speak! I thought you are dumb!
chat.dream_map.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Map
chat.dream_map.3.0.0: Well, Doremy, what's the situation in the reality of Gensokyo?
chat.dream_map.3.0.1: About the reality, maybe the situation was stablized.
chat.dream_map.3.0.2: But, isn't these blocky monsters invading? Stable in this case?
chat.dream_map.3.0.3: True, this is really a big incident, but everyone is used to this.
chat.dream_map.3.0.4: About these blocky monsters, they are big threats for humans without combat ability, they don't have the ability to resist.
chat.dream_map.3.0.5: But not necessarily for some powerful Youkais, preys are the poor blocky things.
chat.dream_map.3.0.6: ...So, We are not needed for help?
chat.dream_map.3.0.7: No, they have a very great amount. The incident continued for 3 years, and their counts only increase.
chat.dream_map.3.0.8: Looks like we must find some methods to eradicate them.
chat.dream_map.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Map
chat.dream_map.4.0.11: The grave besides that tree, it appears lots of times in your dreams.
chat.dream_map.4.0.12: Really...? It seems to be true.
chat.dream_map.4.0.13: I don't know much about the specific situation, but it must be something quite impressive.
chat.dream_map.4.0.14: being impressive because of a dead person...I really want to sympathize with you.
chat.dream_map.4.0.15: <color=blue>(...Strange, I'm not very clear that whose grave it is.)</color>
chat.dream_map.4.0.2: Ah, Steve. I'm observing your dreams.
chat.dream_map.4.0.4: I can find the records of your dreams before.
chat.dream_map.4.0.5: Are... Are you watching me crying for Dave to buy me mechanical toys when I was a child-
chat.dream_map.4.0.6: No no no no no! Of course not this.
chat.dream_map.4.0.7: Though you are cute in that age...
chat.dream_map.4.0.9: What I care about is the grave in your dream.
chat.dream_map.4.name: Dream World Day 4 Map
chat.dream_map.5.0.0: Hey, Doremy, I want to ask you a question.
chat.dream_map.5.0.10: But I...I have not seen any scene of darkness like that!
chat.dream_map.5.0.11: What? You can not see that?
chat.dream_map.5.0.12: I can not see the darkness...?
chat.dream_map.5.0.15: What happened? Doremy? Why are you-
chat.dream_map.5.0.16: That's it! I always thought there was nothing unusual here, My eyes...have been deceived all the time!
chat.dream_map.5.0.17: You stay here and don't go away, I will go to find that thing!
chat.dream_map.5.0.2: Why, does the sky suddenly turn to dark sometimes?
chat.dream_map.5.0.20: Wh-What happened? I have not seen that she's like this...
chat.dream_map.5.0.4: Huh? The sky suddenly turns to dark in battles, We cannot see anything.
chat.dream_map.5.0.5: I thought I was blind, but that darkness can be illuminated by lights.
chat.dream_map.5.0.6: ...What are you talking about? Sky turns to dark?
chat.dream_map.5.0.7: ...? You don't know this? The sky has turned to dark many times before.
chat.dream_map.5.0.8: You did not even notice this?
chat.dream_map.5.name: Dream World Day 5 Map
chat.dream_map.6.0.12: So, are those things just cover ups?!
chat.dream_map.6.0.13: This place has been like this for a long time?!
chat.dream_map.6.0.6: <color=blue>(At that moment, the whole dream world lost its color.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.7: <color=blue>(Things here begin to dissolve and fall off, showing us what they really look like with grim smiles.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.8: <color=blue>(It's a scene I can't forget in my life.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.0.9: <color=blue>(At that time, I understood what the "nightmare" from Doremy's words was.)</color>
chat.dream_map.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Map
chat.dream_map.7.0.13: That's...A horse. A black horse appeared before you came here.
chat.dream_map.7.0.15:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I found out about its existence...a few months ago.
chat.dream_map.7.0.16:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
It's just a horse at that time...I felt strange when I saw it, but I didn't mind that.
chat.dream_map.7.0.17:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I thought, maybe it's just another Youkai... The next day, it disappears.
chat.dream_map.7.0.18:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
Now that I think of it, for it to deceive even me...it might be something extremely horrifying.
chat.dream_map.7.0.19:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
When I heard you say that the dream turns dark, I realized something was wrong.
chat.dream_map.7.0.20:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I was desperate to find that thing....
chat.dream_map.7.0.21:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
I found it at that time, however, It's no longer a horse, It's a monster now...
chat.dream_map.7.0.23:
<color=blue>[Doremy]</color>
Yes...And now I became like this...
chat.dream_map.7.0.3: Yes. Doremy, how are you feeling now?
chat.dream_map.7.0.6: ?! Is that the effect of the curse?
chat.dream_map.7.0.7: I...can't see anything. Where are you?
chat.dream_map.7.0.9: Doremy, could you please tell us what happened?
chat.dream_map.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Map
chat.dream_map.8.0.3: It not's working....the Dream Crystal's healing factor can't recover her life force at all...
chat.dream_map.8.0.4: Th-then what are we supposed to do?!
chat.dream_map.8.0.5: We can only watch as she......I cannot allow this to happen!
chat.dream_map.8.0.8: Please.....leave while you still can.....! Don't mind me......Use your Key!
chat.dream_map.8.0.9: If you stay here.....very soon....you too will be....
chat.dream_map.8.0.10: I'm just a failure of a guardian....i'm begging you.....please leave!
chat.dream_map.8.0.16: ! Wh-what are you trying to do?
chat.dream_map.8.0.17: I'm going to kill that demon.
chat.dream_map.8.0.22: Dave, you know what kind of person I am.
chat.dream_map.8.0.23: I will never forgive those who harm others, nor will I leave someone to feel pain alone.
chat.dream_map.8.0.24: Demon or not, I absolutely will not let it continue to do evil!
chat.dream_map.8.0.26: You're still as stubborn as in the past.
chat.dream_map.8.0.27: Alright, now lure whatever is behind this to us!
chat.dream_map.8.0.28: I'm going to teach it a lesson!
chat.dream_map.8.0.29: Understood.....not like I can stop you anyways.
chat.dream_map.8.0.30: Why.....why do you refuse to leave......
chat.dream_map.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Map
chat.dream_map.9.0.0: Well, Doremy want to see you a time.
chat.dream_map.9.0.1: She still wants us to leave, right?
chat.dream_map.9.0.2: Yes. You have not seen her for days.
chat.dream_map.9.0.4: I understand you. In fact, I also don't want to give up.
chat.dream_map.9.0.5: There's one which I have to see.
chat.dream_map.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Map
chat.dream_map.10.0.1: Yes. Are you sure you want to do this?
chat.dream_map.10.0.2: I still said that. If you successes, we will be saved.
chat.dream_map.10.0.3: But if you fails, it's not as simple as one life.
chat.dream_map.10.0.4: Since there is no other way, I can only do so.
chat.dream_map.10.0.5: Doremy's body is on the verge of limit.
chat.dream_map.10.0.6: Miss Doremy...She never want me to fight with it.
chat.dream_map.10.0.7: But for helping her, I can only not see her.
chat.dream_map.10.name: Dream World Day 10 Map
chat.dream_map.11.0.0: I apologize for my reckless behavior, Miss Doremy.
chat.dream_map.11.0.1: No no no. No need to apologize. Also you saved the whole dream world right?
chat.dream_map.11.0.2: You are such a worrying child, but I don't hate it.
chat.dream_map.11.0.3: <color=blue>(...Doremy looks at me like her own child...)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.4: Ah, by the way, there's something I have to tell you.
chat.dream_map.11.0.9: Do you remember, the grave in your dream?
chat.dream_map.11.0.11: I seeked carefully before and found that the grave was actually one you saw when you were very young.
chat.dream_map.11.0.12: At that time, I was involved in Nightmare's scheme before I could tell you. Now it's time to tell.
chat.dream_map.11.0.13: A grave when I was a child? But I don't remember any graves near Dave's house.
chat.dream_map.11.0.14: That was earlier. At that time, you were a baby.
chat.dream_map.11.0.16: <color=blue>(My childhood memory only stays since I was about two or three years old.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.17: <color=blue>(I have neither father nor mother. Only Dave, as an adoptive father, raised me.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.18: <color=blue>(But I'm not a blocky creature like Dave, so I'm often treated as an outcast.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.19: <color=blue>(Therefore, I always care who my biological father and mother are.)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.23: Your memory seems to stop here. You can't even remember the appearance of the person in your dream.
chat.dream_map.11.0.24: I can only say I'm sorry.
chat.dream_map.11.0.25: ...That's it. Thank you very much, Miss Doremy.
chat.dream_map.11.0.26: I was actually an orphan. Dave has been raising me.
chat.dream_map.11.0.27: Over the years, I've always wanted to know who my biological parents are.
chat.dream_map.11.0.28: I understand. But we'll probably see each other again.
chat.dream_map.11.0.29: You may meet me when you are dreaming. Let's talk again then.
chat.dream_map.11.0.30: During that time in Gensokyo, I'll keep searching your dreams.
chat.dream_map.11.0.31: <color=blue>(...I hope you don't search my embarrassing memories again!)</color>
chat.dream_map.11.0.32: Well, we can finally go to Gensokyo!
chat.dream_map.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Map
chat.dream_over.1.0.1: You can place non-aquatic contraptions on it!
chat.dream_over.1.0.2: That is to say, you can set up battle lines on water now!
chat.dream_over.1.0.3: Pity that it can't smash boats like its ancestors!
chat.dream_over.1.0.4: Human outside, let me see what dreams you have...
chat.dream_over.1.name: Dream World Day 1 Outro
chat.dream_over.2.0.1: It can shoot arrows to enemies like normal Dispensers!
chat.dream_over.2.0.2: But you can place another Drivensers on them to increase arrow shots per time!
chat.dream_over.2.0.3: The maxinium is 5 arrows per time!
chat.dream_over.2.0.4: If one can't be solve the problem, use a pile!
chat.dream_over.2.name: Dream World Day 2 Outro
chat.dream_over.3.0.1: This is Gravity Pad, it can increase the gravity of objects above it!
chat.dream_over.3.0.2: Not only slows enemies walked on them, but also pulls down projectiles while facing low-height enemies!
chat.dream_over.3.0.3: Oh by the way, don't place them under an apple tree...
chat.dream_over.3.name: Dream World Day 3 Outro
chat.dream_over.4.0.1: Vortex Hoppers can be placed in water, and will pull enemies down into the water when touched!
chat.dream_over.4.name: Dream World Day 4 Outro
chat.dream_over.5.0.0: Hey! Neighbor! You found an Ender Chest!
chat.dream_over.5.0.1: I put lots of goods in my Ender Chest before! Do you know what does it mean?
chat.dream_over.5.0.2: This means - Crazy Villager's Store are now officially open!
chat.dream_over.5.0.3: Buy one get zero! Come come buy buy!
chat.dream_over.5.name: Dream World Day 5 Outro
chat.dream_over.6.0.1: It will emit spikes similar to arrows! And when it meets flying enemies, it will stretch itself to attack them!
chat.dream_over.6.0.2: A Pistenser a day keeps the Ghasts away!
chat.dream_over.6.name: Dream World Day 6 Outro
chat.dream_over.7.0.1: It can shoot darts which can weaken enemies, and make them cannot deal any damage!
chat.dream_over.7.0.2: And it can do a fire breath to burn near enemies!
chat.dream_over.7.0.3: At last, throw a deadly poisonous javelin!
chat.dream_over.7.name: Dream World Day 7 Outro
chat.dream_over.8.0.1: It's an obstacle which can regenerate itself!
chat.dream_over.8.0.2: And can also be used to heal other lives!
chat.dream_over.8.0.3: We can heal Doremy with this!...Maybe.
chat.dream_over.8.name: Dream World Day 8 Outro
chat.dream_over.9.0.1: This is Dream Silk! Place them on contraptions, and they will fall asleep!
chat.dream_over.9.0.2: And will generate a starshard for you after awake!
chat.dream_over.9.0.3: And... I'll try using it to relieve Doremy's pain.
chat.dream_over.9.name: Dream World Day 9 Outro
chat.dream_over.11.0.7: AWESOME done, neighbor! Now the nightmare of dream world is completely destroyed!
chat.dream_over.11.name: Dream World Day 11 Outro
chat.halloween.1.0.2: We'll find it anyway. By my beard!
chat.halloween.1.0.3: It seems like there are also zombies here.
chat.halloween.1.0.4: Out of my kindness, you're gonna be the one finishing them!
chat.halloween.1.0.6: Our mine works on solar energy, and it's night.
chat.halloween.1.0.7: So there's no more energy for the energy generator to generate energy.
chat.halloween.1.0.8: Rely on your Furnaces to survive this night!
chat.halloween.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Intro
chat.halloween.11.0.0: Before we begin, here’s a hot tip for boss battles.
chat.halloween.11.0.1: ALWAYS try to look out for whatever swiggity swooty the boss guy can do!
chat.halloween.11.0.2: And some thingamabobs to COUNTER whatever that is. Ya get what I mean?
chat.halloween.11.0.3: Keep in mind that, choosing what contraptions to sacrifice, and what not to is crucial for this battle.
chat.halloween.11.0.4: From what I’ve seen, TNTs also have the ability to absorb lightnings and become high-pressured.
chat.halloween.11.0.5: Let’s make good use of that, neighbor!
chat.halloween.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Intro
chat.halloween.3.0.0: By the way, what are those statues?
chat.halloween.3.0.1: Those statues... I heard them being called as Gargoyles.
chat.halloween.3.0.2: I'm not so sure about its exact details. I need to read the Almanac.
chat.halloween.3.0.5: Looks like we aren't gonna learn what Gargoyles are tonight.
chat.halloween.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Intro
chat.halloween.4.0.1: Maybe I lost it while I was fighting those monsters.
chat.halloween.4.0.3: Don't mind about it... Perhaps those zombies will bring the Almanac back.
chat.halloween.4.0.4: Because... hmm... They seem to pick up... anything they encounter.
chat.halloween.4.0.5: Maybe one of them got a hold of my Almanac too.
chat.halloween.4.0.6: Really? Time to hunt for... whoever got the Almanac!
chat.halloween.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Intro
chat.halloween.6.0.0: Key's gone, luck ain't good. But put that aside and focus on today’s fight!
chat.halloween.6.0.1: The storm is raging, and the sky is dark!
chat.halloween.6.0.2: No zombies today, but don’t ignore the ghosts - they can be completely invisible!
chat.halloween.6.0.3: Never fear, we can still discover them by the light from lightning strikes!
chat.halloween.6.0.4: Take your sword into battle! But avoid attacking those innocent ghosts passing by, or they will punish you!
chat.halloween.6.0.5: Now, let’s hunt those who have fallen into darkness!
chat.halloween.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Intro
chat.halloween.8.0.0: We can’t be all just sitting here waiting for Frankenstein to come!
chat.halloween.8.0.1: Just the time I have some Lure spells to find and attract the target!
chat.halloween.8.0.2: Time for me to use this bad boy! We should be able to find the target in about three days!
chat.halloween.8.name: Halloween Day 8 Intro
chat.halloween.9.0.0: Here... I think you should be reminded.
chat.halloween.9.0.1: Some dead Necromancers have been buried beneath this graveyard.
chat.halloween.9.0.2: Though they are dead, their ability of necromancy still exists.
chat.halloween.9.0.3: If they are resurrected, try to find good counters against their witchcraft.
chat.halloween.9.name: Halloween Day 9 Intro
chat.halloween_final.0.0: Portal is ready, you can now start journey.
chat.halloween_final.0.1: So... I wish you good luck.
chat.halloween_final.0.2: Hey, neighbour! we can finally be on the way!
chat.halloween_final.name: Halloween Parting
chat.halloween_map.1.0.0: Wow! A wild witch has appeared!
chat.halloween_map.1.0.1: Ah? Looks like she's not really...
chat.halloween_map.1.0.2: Excuse me, who are you and how did you get here?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.3: We found a treasure map! So we're going wherever it tells us to go!
chat.halloween_map.1.0.5: Could you do me a favor?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.6: It's that... More zombies and undead start to appear recently. Could you help me... put them to rest?
chat.halloween_map.1.0.7: No problem! Leave it to me- MY PAL, STEVE!
chat.halloween_map.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Map
chat.halloween_map.11.0.0: Once again, my thanks to you.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.1: As promised, I will now teleport you to Gensokyo.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.10: Seems like our battle still has a long way to go!
chat.halloween_map.11.0.11: Right... I will now prepare the portal. Best of luck, both of you.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.2: Hey neighbor! We finally get to go there!
chat.halloween_map.11.0.3: However, there are two things you need to keep in mind.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.4: First, this key can only teleport you to the Dream World. If you wish to truly arrive in Gensokyo, you will have to look for a method to access the reality world.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.5: Second... Gensokyo is currently a big mess.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.7: As you can see here, a lot of monsters start to appear out of nowhere, and they all have this... weird blocky shape.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.8: These blocky monsters seem to have spread all the way to Gensokyo, so the reality world is now nothing but chaos.
chat.halloween_map.11.0.9: However, if you were there, perhaps this problem could be resolved?
chat.halloween_map.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Map
chat.halloween_map.2.0.0: You do seem to... have excellent skills.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.1: Oh, it seems like I haven't properly introduced myself.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.2: I'm Orant, a soul sorceress, I'm here... waiting for someone.
chat.halloween_map.2.0.6: In our villages, we rely on Iron Golems to defend from those monsters!
chat.halloween_map.2.0.7: And you, should be the creator of the Iron Golems' prototypes?
chat.halloween_map.2.0.9: But... I've left that behind for a long time.
chat.halloween_map.2.name: Halloween Day 2 Map
chat.halloween_map.3.0.1: A kind of glowing stone from the Nether... Extremely rare in the overworld.
chat.halloween_map.3.0.2: It... glows. But... what needs to be lit...?
chat.halloween_map.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Map
chat.halloween_map.4.0.0: I’ve been noticing... some strange things about this swamp.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.1: We’ve stayed here for 4 days, but it's still Halloween’s eve!
chat.halloween_map.4.0.2: Ah, That's because this place has been witched.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.3: Or cursed... The time of this swamp will be Halloween’s eve forever.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.4: Just like a mysterious painting... where time stopped eternally.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.5: That’s a weird phenomenon and all, but it won’t get in our way.
chat.halloween_map.4.0.6: Well then, neighbor, keep on finding the Almanac!
chat.halloween_map.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Map
chat.halloween_map.5.0.0: Hm, that's to say... Why did you guys follow that map all the way over here?
chat.halloween_map.5.0.10: That monster... was so strong that fleeing was my only choice. And the key was robbed at that time.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.2: We wanna go to another world called Gensokyo! We’ve been looking everywhere for a way to get there!
chat.halloween_map.5.0.3: Go to... another world, isn’t it? Right, I do have such a method for that.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.4: I have a magical key, it can open a portal to the Dream World, which connects to other worlds.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.5: Ooh, is that so? Then could you help sending us there?
chat.halloween_map.5.0.6: Um... To be honest, there’s a problem.
chat.halloween_map.5.0.9: When I was on patrol nearby, I was attacked by a... monster.
chat.halloween_map.5.name: Halloween Day 5 Map
chat.halloween_map.6.0.0: So, what's the monster that attacked you?
chat.halloween_map.6.0.1: A giant, terrible and strong corpse monster, powered with enormous amount of electricity. It's called... Frankenstein.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.2: Frankenstein? But that's just some fictional stuff from a novel!
chat.halloween_map.6.0.3: I also thought it was... but it really does exist.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.4: Sorry for my negligence... the situation should’ve not been like this.
chat.halloween_map.6.0.5: Never mind that, we just need to get the key back!
chat.halloween_map.6.0.6: ...If you wish to combat with the monster, please take caution...
chat.halloween_map.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Map
chat.halloween_map.7.0.0: I’ve been wondering, any idea on what the key looks like?
chat.halloween_map.7.0.1: That key is called the Dream Key.
chat.halloween_map.7.0.2: Using a Dream Key is one way to teleport to other worlds. However, a downside to this method is, you must first visit the Dream World of your targeted world.
chat.halloween_map.7.0.3: You’ll later have to find a way to manually access the reality of that world via its Dream World as well. Teleporting you to the Dream World is all the key can do.
chat.halloween_map.7.0.4: Still sounds like a cool thing for me!
chat.halloween_map.7.0.5: If we have one, we can definitely go to Gensokyo!
chat.halloween_map.7.name: Halloween Day 7 Map
chat.halloween_over.1.0.0: This is our old friend, Small Dispenser!
chat.halloween_over.1.0.1: Say hello to our little friend!
chat.halloween_over.1.0.2: Small Dispensers don't need ME to be placed. They can shoot short-ranged snowballs and are great contraptions for the night!
chat.halloween_over.1.name: Halloween Day 1 Outro
chat.halloween_over.11.0.0: This is my Dream Key! You did it!
chat.halloween_over.11.0.1: And with that, Frankenstein has also returned to the place where he belongs.
chat.halloween_over.11.0.2: I am truly grateful for all that you have done for me so far.
chat.halloween_over.11.0.3: How could that be grateful for? We just did what we had to do!
chat.halloween_over.11.name: Halloween Day 11 Outro
chat.halloween_over.2.0.0: Hey! This is the Moonlight Sensor!
chat.halloween_over.2.0.1:
It can automatically produce ME under the moonlight or in darkness! 
And it increases its yield after a while!
chat.halloween_over.2.0.2: Because of its low ME cost, use it instead of Furnaces!
chat.halloween_over.2.name: Halloween Day 2 Outro
chat.halloween_over.3.0.0: This is Glowstone, it can light up an area around it and dispel fog!
chat.halloween_over.3.0.1: But... where is fog in a place full of moonlight?
chat.halloween_over.3.name: Halloween Day 3 Outro
chat.halloween_over.4.0.1: It can knock back enemies for a long distance! And heavily damage fragile stones or other objects!
chat.halloween_over.4.0.2: However, it will be broken after the punch, and needs some time to repair itself!
chat.halloween_over.4.name: Halloween Day 4 Outro
chat.halloween_over.5.0.0: Aha! Finally we found Orant's Almanac!
chat.halloween_over.5.0.2: Thank you... However, perhaps you need this more than I do.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.4: ...This Almanac will automatically record contraptions, enemies and other infomation you've come across- it is a really convenient tool.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.5: If it's you, you might make the most out of it.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.6: And to express my appreciation, please take it as a gift.
chat.halloween_over.5.0.7: Oh really? Sweet! Thanks a bunch!
chat.halloween_over.5.name: Halloween Day 5 Outro
chat.halloween_over.6.0.0: Happy birthday! Here’s your dangerous cake!
chat.halloween_over.6.0.1: This is TNT! After you trigger it, it will go KABOOM and blow up all the surrounding enemies!
chat.halloween_over.6.name: Halloween Day 6 Outro
chat.halloween_over.7.0.1: Behold, the Soul Furnace! It can shoot DEADLY soulfire balls and burn groups of enemies upon hit!
chat.halloween_over.7.0.2: But what does it cost? It needs to sacrifice a contraption in front of it as its fuel!
chat.halloween_over.7.0.3: Let the enemies BURN IN HELL!
chat.halloween_over.7.name: Halloween Day 7 Outro
chat.halloween_over.8.0.0: The Perfect and Elegant Dispenser is here!
chat.halloween_over.8.0.1: Here comes Silvenser! Its knives can slice fleshes and deal more damages! And can pierce anything which are not hard!
chat.halloween_over.8.0.2: It's about time we showed The World!
chat.halloween_over.8.name: Halloween Day 8 Outro
chat.halloween_over.9.0.0: Do you still remember the clown fairy from Hell?
chat.halloween_over.9.0.1: Magic Chest, or Magichest! It swallows an enemy in front of it, and then transforms itself into a Starshard!
chat.halloween_over.9.0.2: Who's up for a magic show?
chat.halloween_over.9.name: Halloween Day 9 Outro
chat.note_halloween.0.0: An invitation! From the zombies! To a party!
chat.note_halloween.0.1: That is... one heck of a handwriting.
chat.note_halloween.0.2: Hold on, shooting... and electric arcs? That's how Frankenstein attacks!
chat.note_halloween.0.3: Perhaps... you will be in for a tough fight.
chat.note_halloween.0.4: Neighbor, this is an opportunity we can’t miss!
chat.note_halloween.name: Halloween invitation
chat.note_prologue.0.0: This looks like a treasure map!
chat.note_prologue.0.1: What’s this portal at the end of the map?
chat.note_prologue.0.2: Maybe... it will lead us to some MAGICAL places!!!
chat.note_prologue.0.3: And we might even arrive at that Gensokyo world I’ve been telling you about!
chat.note_prologue.0.4: Y’know, a world with humans and youkai! And magical powers from various legends!
chat.note_prologue.0.5: CRAAZZYY, RIGHT??? We’re coming for ya, very-suspicious-looking portal!
chat.note_prologue.name: Treasure map?
chat.note_dream.0.1: Just a piece of waste paper.
chat.note_dream.0.2: It does seem to have words on it. Probably because we are in the dream, the above words are not clear.
chat.seventh_slot.0.0: Before we start, I assume that you’ll need the 7th contraption slot!
chat.seventh_slot.2.0: 750$ for 7th slot, but... seems like you’re still broke...
chat.seventh_slot.2.1: Come back to this level when you have enough money!
chat.seventh_slot.4.0: What a pity! If you want it, come back to this level!
chat.seventh_slot.name: Slot deal
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.0: Hey, pal, Let me share you some MAGICAL things!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.1: This is called the Starshard! It changes into a different item based on our location!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.2: However, the effect is the same - Activating your contraptions' Evocation ability!
chat.starshard_tutorial.0.3: Alright, let's try Magic Candy - the Starshard of this area!
chat.starshard_tutorial.1.1: Oh boy! Looks like more guests need to be entertained!
chat.starshard_tutorial.name: Starshard Tutorial
chat.trigger_tutorial.0.0: Well, to start off, lemme teach you how to trigger contraptions!
chat.trigger_tutorial.name: Trigger Tutorial
chat.tutorial.0.0: Hey, neighbor, long time no see!
chat.tutorial.0.1: It's been a long time since I last saw you!
chat.tutorial.0.2: How is your experience with the contraptions now?
chat.tutorial.0.3: You almost forgot everything, huh? Would you like a review?
chat.tutorial.3.0: Hey, neighbor! You're getting the hang of it!
chat.tutorial.3.1: I didn't say anything and yet you've already completed the tutorial!
chat.tutorial.4.0: Ah! Those zombies are coming after you again.
chat.tutorial.4.1: Neighbor, use your skills to defeat them!
chat.tutorial.name: Tutorial
contraption.anvil.description:
Health: <color=red>Mid-High</color>

Finally someone found my description!
contraption.anvil.description_header: Anvil crushes enemies below it and acts as a temporary barrier.
contraption.anvil.name: Anvil
contraption.anvil.tooltip: Fall from the sky to crush enemies, also a barrier
contraption.dispenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>

"People usually ask me how I can shoot infinite arrows, and without redstone." said Dispenser. "First, my fence is connected to a redstone pulse. Second, I was enchanted with Unbreaking III and Infinity arrows. What? How can I talk?"
contraption.dispenser.description_evocat: Evocation: shoots a large number of arrows frontwards
contraption.dispenser.description_header: Dispensers are your first line of defense, they shoot arrows at incoming enemies.
contraption.dispenser.name: Dispenser
contraption.dream_crystal.description:
Toughness: <color=red>Slightly higher</color>
Special: has regeneration

Chemistry class be like:
"Dream Crystal is a pink colour, semi-transparent crystal with regeneration effect, mainly composed of Dreamium Diowhat (The chemical formula is DrO2),can be used to refine Nightmarium KonoDioda(NmO2) using Nightmarium Sulfate (NmSO4), which is the main component of Maren o l……~~--~zzzzZZZZ"
contraption.dream_crystal.description_ev: Evocation: becomes invincible, regenerate health for surrounding contraptions
contraption.dream_crystal.description_he: Dream Crystals slowly regenerate their health.
contraption.dream_crystal.name: Dream Crystal
contraption.dream_silk.description:
Special: single use

Dream Silk is a sleepy guy, the first thing he does after awaking up is sleeping. Look at him, its recharging time is increased because of this.
contraption.dream_silk.description_heade: Dream Silk makes a contraption to fall asleep. After it wakes up, a Starshard would appear.
contraption.dream_silk.name: Dream Silk
contraption.dream_silk.tooltip: Let a contraption fall asleep, create a Starshard after waking up
contraption.drivenser.description:
Special: can only be upgraded 4 times
Drivenser is a technical nerd, he also knows how to assemble a computer, properties of different softwares and hardwares, different coding languages, etc. Recently he wants to compile a game to re-tell this war with the zombies, but someone's already ahead.
contraption.drivenser.description_header: Place Drivensers on itself to add the number of arrows per shot.
contraption.drivenser.name: Drivenser
contraption.drivenser.tooltip: Stackable, add arrows per shot after stacked
contraption.force_pad.description:
<color=red>Must be placed on Gravity Pad</color>
Usage: 
Up/Down: <color=red>Change Objects' Lanes</color>
Front/Back: <color=red>Make projectiles turn back, or boost and add knockback on them. Move enemies which walk on.</color>

Unlike the other's thinking, Force Block doesn't like to force others to do things. He thinks that everyone should follow his own will, and everyone is free to do anything. But sometimes, he will force some people to make changes, which can't help him.
contraption.force_pad.description_evocat: Evocation: Move enemies around to a certain place.
contraption.force_pad.description_header: The force direction of Force Pads can be changed by triggering. Take advantage of this to change the move trail of things on it, and buff the projectiles.
contraption.force_pad.name: Force Pad
contraption.force_pad.tooltip:
(Requires Gravity Pad)
Change the force on thing over it
contraption.furnace.description:
ME production: <color=red>Medium</color>

Someone was so lazy that they installed a dropper attached to the mine under it. Oh and that mine uses geothermal energy.
contraption.furnace.description_evocatio: Evocation: generates a large number of redstone
contraption.furnace.description_header: Furnaces are essential for you to generate extra redstone which can be converted to ME. Try placing as many as you can!
contraption.furnace.name: Furnace
contraption.glowstone.description: And God said: Let there be light, and there were torches. And God said: Let there be solid light, and there were glowstones. And God said: Let there be controllable solid light, and there was redstone light. God said: Ok that's enough
contraption.glowstone.description_header: The light from Glowstones can clear fog, detect ghosts and protect contraptions from rebelling.
contraption.glowstone.name: Glowstone
contraption.glowstone.tooltip: Light areas, clear fog and detect ghosts
contraption.gravity_pad.description:
Special: cannot be eaten by enemies

Once upon a time, Gravity Block was sitting under an apple tree, and suddenly an apple fell on its head, and then it was smashed flat - it was Golden Apple.
contraption.gravity_pad.description_evoc: Evocation: Anvil falls from the sky, crushes enemies and stops them
contraption.gravity_pad.description_head: Gravity Pads can lower the height of projectiles above it, and make enemies on it unable to climb or jump.
contraption.gravity_pad.name: Gravity Pad
contraption.gravity_pad.tooltip: Increase the gravity of things above it
contraption.infectenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
<color=red>Must be placed on Small Disnepsner</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

Infectenser has won the Disbel Prize in virology, but due to the epidemic situation, the award ceremony could not be held.
contraption.infectenser.description_evoc: Evocation: Make all parasitizing parabots to self-destruct.
contraption.infectenser.description_head: Infectenser can shoot parabots which both deal damage and parasitize enemies. Parasitized enemies will shoot new parabots to enemies around.
contraption.infectenser.name: Infectenser
contraption.infectenser.tooltip:
(Requires Small Dispenser)
Shoot parabots which spread between enemies
contraption.lily_pad.description:
<color=blue>Can only be placed on water</color>

"Why are you making me a gift for Sakuya?! I am NOT a lily chest pad!"
contraption.lily_pad.description_evocati: Evocation: summons four copies at four directions
contraption.lily_pad.description_header: Lilypads allows you to place non-aquatic contraptions directly on water.
contraption.lily_pad.name: Lilypad
contraption.lily_pad.tooltip: Allow you to place contraptions on water
contraption.magichest.description: Clownpiece was obssessed with America after seeing the USA flag on the Moon, and Magichest was obssessed with it after seeing Clownpiece. Now he's all down the streets protesting and shouting "AMERICA F*#K YEAH" and no one can stop him.
contraption.magichest.description_evocat: Evocation: summons a Ghast. Also try Nether Blame!
contraption.magichest.description_header: Magichests transform into a Starshard after swallowing an enemy whole.
contraption.magichest.name: Magichest
contraption.magichest.tooltip: Swallow an enemy, then transform into a Starshard
contraption.mine_tnt.description:
Damage: <color=red>Extremely High</color>

Why do Mine TNTs need time to arm themselves? It's been an enigma for years. What can go wrong if he can be instantly armed? It's a normal thing for him however. He was asleep.
contraption.mine_tnt.description_evocati: Evocation: instantly arms itself, then place two copies of itself on the rightmost column.
contraption.mine_tnt.description_header: Mine TNTs cause a great deal of damage, but they need a while to arm themselves.
contraption.mine_tnt.name: Mine TNT
contraption.mine_tnt.tooltip: Explode on contact, but take time to arm itself
contraption.moonlight_sensor.description:
ME production: <color=red>Low</color>, then <color=red>medium</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

Maybe you're asking why it isn't a Daylight Sensor. It moonlights as a Moonlight Sensor, and it loves the job so much.
Evocation: instantly upgrades, glows with blue light and increases its yield by 2.5 times.
Moonlight Sensors provide ME at night, and increase the yield after a while.
contraption.moonlight_sensor.name: Moonlight Sensor
contraption.moonlight_sensor.tooltip: Automatically provide ME, increase the yield after a while
contraption.obsidian.description:
Toughness: <color=red>High</color>

It is said that there's an Easter egg that can be found after forming the shape of a Nether portal with Obsidians and placing a Furnace in the middle. Would you like to try?


























Congratulations, you've been fooled
contraption.obsidian.description_evocati: Evocation: restores health completely, gain Netherite Armor
contraption.obsidian.description_header: Obsidians are hard materials which you can use to prevent monsters from advancing and protect your other contraptions.
contraption.obsidian.name: Obsidian
contraption.pistenser.description:
Special: can attack enemies on air

"It's over zombies, I have the high ground!" Those were his last words before a Ghast burns his leg- uhh, neck off.
contraption.pistenser.description_evocat: Evocation: shoots giant armor-piercing spike seeds to at most 10 enemies
contraption.pistenser.description_header: Pistensers can stretch themselves to attack enemies on air.
contraption.pistenser.name: Pistenser
contraption.pistenser.tooltip: Stretch itself to attack enemies on air.
contraption.punchton.description:
Damage: <color=red>Slightly High</color>, and <color=red>Ignore Armors</color>

Punchton the piston, or One Punch Piston, punched a punch using a punch of tons.
contraption.punchton.description_evocati: Evocation: extends piston arm and performs a knockback to all enemies in front
contraption.punchton.description_header: Punchtons can knock back enemies frontwards, and crush stones.
contraption.punchton.name: Punchton
contraption.punchton.tooltip: Knock back enemies and crush stones
contraption.random_china.name: Random China
contraption.random_china.tooltip: Spawn a random contraption upon destroyed
contraption.silvenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Low-Medium</color>, <color=red>Medium-High</color> for fleshes
Special: projectiles deal more damage to specific enemy types, blocked by hard objects

"DiDi, I've learned something... The more arrows you shoot, the more unexpected events come along. As long as you cannot go beyond your arrows...""What? What do you mean?!""I reject my arrows, DiDi!"
contraption.silvenser.description_evocat: Evocation: creates circles of knives with at most 10 enemies as the centers, knives start flying after a few seconds.
contraption.silvenser.description_header: Silvensers shoot piercing knives which can slice the flesh but are blocked by hard objects.
contraption.silvenser.name: Silvenser
contraption.silvenser.tooltip: Shoot knives which slice the flesh and pierce enemies
contraption.small_dispenser.description:
Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

There are rocks in the snowballs, stop asking.
contraption.small_dispenser.description_: Evocation: shoots a snowball that gets bigger and bigger
Small Dispensers can shoot short-ranged snowballs.
contraption.small_dispenser.name: Small Dispenser
contraption.soul_furnace.description:
Damage: <color=red>High</color>
Special: needs to be fueled by burning other contraptions
<color=blue>Can only be used at night</color>

What is it burning inside the Soul Furnace? Sinners' soul? Slags of Hell? Don't think too much. It's just an ordinary jack o' lantern.
contraption.soul_furnace.description_evo: Evocation: consumes all the remaining fuel to shoot Soulfire Balls towards random enemies.
contraption.soul_furnace.description_hea: Soul Furances shoot terrifying soulfires, but will burn the contraption in front as its fuel.
contraption.soul_furnace.name: Soul Furance
contraption.soul_furnace.tooltip: Shoot strong soulfires, but burn the contraption in front
contraption.tnt.description:
Damage: <color=red>Very high</color>

TNT needs gunpowder to be crafted. But in reality the TNT and gunpowder have nothing to do with each other. Why is this? Nobody knows.
contraption.tnt.description_evocation: Evocation: blasts into 4 flying copies of itself that explode on impact
contraption.tnt.description_header: TNTs deal huge damage to surrounding enemies after being triggered.
contraption.tnt.name: TNT
contraption.tnt.tooltip: Blow up surrounding enemies after being triggered
contraption.totenser.description:
Special: posion on the dart decreases enemies's damage

What god does Totenser believe in? According to the history of Contraption Intelligence, It may believe in various mechanic gods. Some people say that it actually believes in the human inventor who made the machine, and some even say that it believes in the mechanic old gods. People discussing, but they don't know, It just put his faith in his waifus.
contraption.totenser.description_evocati: Evocation: throws a spear which pierces enemies, and leave a trial with weakening gas
contraption.totenser.description_header: Totensers shoot poisonous darts and burn nearby enemies with fire.
contraption.totenser.name: Totenser
contraption.totenser.tooltip: Shoot weakening darts and burn nearby enemies
contraption.vortex_hopper.description:
<color=blue>Can only be placed on water</color>

As for his favorite pastime, he likes to spin himself as a spinning top while singing "MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAWARE MAA WAA REE!".
contraption.vortex_hopper.description_ev: Evocation: Drag enemies in a wider range underwater
contraption.vortex_hopper.description_he: Vortex Hoppers drag all closing enemies underwater when spinning.
contraption.vortex_hopper.name: Vortex Hopper
death_message.cave_spider: Here comes the itsy bitsy spider!
death_message.crushing_walls: <color=red>C O M E   T O   U S</color>
death_message.gargoyle: Job's done, back to vibing as a statue.
death_message.missing: You tell the creator, he forgot to set the death message.
death_message.mummy: Are you winning, son? - ur mummy
death_message.necromancer:
You Died
 Death took 42690 gold and some XP away
death_message.parasite_terror: There are no healthy people in the world...
death_message.zombie: I'm gonna eat your brains. We're the undead!
drop.redstone.name: Redstone
drop.starshard.name: Starshard
enemy.bone_wall.name: Bone Wall
enemy.capped_zombie.description: Throughout the development of time, leather caps have gradually faded out of people's sights. But there are still some zombies holding onto their leather caps. When asked why, they always say, "No leather caps no pp"
enemy.capped_zombie.description_header:
Leather Cap Zombies have leather cap armors that resist bullets.

Toughness: <color=red>Medium</color>
Speed: <color=red>Medium</color>
enemy.capped_zombie.name: Leather Cap Zombie
enemy.cave_spider.description: It has won the "Spidernet Surfing Competition" many times, just because other spiders can't swim.
enemy.cave_spider.description_header:
Cave Spiders cannot climb over the contraptions, but they can only be hit by low height projectiles and can swim.

Durability: <color=red>Very Low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>
Special: <color=red>Can only be hit by low height projectiles</color>
enemy.cave_spider.name: Cave Spider
enemy.flag_zombie.description: When he was awarded the flag, he felt extremely honored and proud. He felt as if he was the leader of the zombies, he had the supreme position, and he fluttered all the time. However, he didn't know how many zombies behind were laughing at him as a meatshield.
enemy.flag_zombie.description_header:
The appearance of flag-holding zombies marks the arrival of a large wave of zombies.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
enemy.flag_zombie.name: Flag Zombie
enemy.gargoyle.description: These guys usually stay silent as statues all the time, but they're actually just saving up their energy for another stormy night - which is when they party.
enemy.gargoyle.description_header:
Gargoyles will be revived from statues when the Final Wave comes.

Toughness: <color=red>Medium-High</color>

Weakness: <color=red>Punchtons</color>
enemy.gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
enemy.ghast.description:
########ANNOUNCEMENT########
· Local Hell Creature Exhibition Hall contains various types of hell creatures, including ghasts, zombified piglins (out of stock), wither skeletons, etc.
· Prohibit touching hell creatures by all means
· No photography
· Do not feed diamond helmets to ghasts
enemy.ghast.description_header:
Ghasts can fly in the sky and bombard your contraptions.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Average</color>
Features: <color=red>Will not be hit by bullets of normal height</color>
enemy.ghast.name: Ghast
enemy.ghost.description: When you walk at night and hear someone calling your name, don't look back, otherwise there'll be ghosts - and you'll scare them to death.
enemy.ghost.description_header:
Ghosts can reduce most taken damage in ethereal form.

Toughness: <color=red>Extremely High</color>, <color=red>Low</color> after being illuminated
Special: <color=red>reduces most taken damage in ethereal form</color>
Weakness: <color=red>Lose ethereality when illuminated</color>
enemy.ghost.name: Ghost
enemy.helmeted_zombie.description: From that helmet, one may assume he used to be a warrior in his lifetime, but it's not like that, he just has more IQ.
enemy.helmeted_zombie.description_header:
The iron helmet of the Iron Helmet Zombie provides him with extremely high protection.

Toughness: <color=red>High</color>
enemy.helmeted_zombie.name: Iron Helmet Zombie
enemy.mother_terror.description: Good at inserting bugs into network files.
enemy.mother_terror.description_header:
Mother Terrors will lay they eggs into other enemies's body.

Durability: <color=red>Medium</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>, then <color=red>Very Slow (After laid eggs)</color>
Special: <color=red>Flesh bodies they touched will be parasitic</color>
enemy.mother_terror.name: Mother Terror
enemy.mummy.description: Just like everyone's mummy, mummies like perfumes. They're fanatic enough to carve the fragrance into the bones, putting people around them to death. They died from mummies, so they're called... "Deaddies".
enemy.mummy.description_header:
Mummies will release gas after they die, which can heal the undead and damage contraptions.

Toughness: <color=red>Low-Medium</color>
Weakness：<color=red>Fire, Fire can burn its gas</color>
enemy.mummy.name: Mummy
enemy.napstablook.name: Napstablook
enemy.necromancer.description: The Necromancers can’t figure out why they have to deal with others overtaxing them or calling them evil witches because they raise the dead. They just want to build a wall.
enemy.necromancer.description_header:
Necromancer can build temporary bone walls to block bullets.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Bone Wall Toughness: <color=red>Low-Medium</color>
enemy.necromancer.name: Necromancer
enemy.parasite_terror.description: It hasn't figured out how to write its own network jokes.
enemy.parasite_terror.description_header:
Parasite Terrors will shred the hosts' bodies and come out after they matures.

Durability: <color=red>Extremely Low - Very Low (Variable)</color>
Speed: <color=red>Very Fast</color>
enemy.parasite_terror.name: Parasite Terror
enemy.skeleton.description: Skeletons possess high archery accomplishments. People saw with their own eyes that one of them shot a sleeping wolf, but it didn't die, it WOKE.
enemy.skeleton.description_header:
Skeletons can shoot arrows at your rightmost contraption.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Arrow Damage: <color=red>Medium</color>
Special: <color=red>unable to shoot and ignore low-height contraptions</color>
enemy.skeleton.name: Skeleton
enemy.spider.description: The Net bars opened by Spiders is quite profitable, because everyone are stuck by the net.
enemy.spider.description_header:
Spiders can climb over your defenses.

Durability: <color=red>Low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Fast</color>
Special: <color=red>Can climb over defensive contraptions</color>
enemy.spider.name: Spider
enemy.zombie.description: After the failure of the last Zombie War, the Zombie self-reflected in the corner for three days three nights. Later, he began to exercise himself, trying to be stronger to eat more brains. Now he looks... Well, he hasn't changed a bit.
enemy.zombie.description_header:
Zombies will run towards your house until they're defeated.

Toughness: <color=red>Low</color>
Speed: <color=red>Medium</color>
enemy.zombie.name: Zombie
error.failed_loading_level_error:
An error happened while loading the level.
Please submit the bug report to the author.
error.failed_loading_level_no_version_ta:
The version of save data is unknown.
Please restart the level.
misc.almanac.description:
The book is written in this book, and you are reading an entry in this book about the book itself described by this book.
When you look at the entry of the book in this book and feel dizzy, you feel dizzy reading the description by this book for the book in this book.
Time for you to revise your English.
misc.almanac.description_header: A magical almanac, once owned by Orant, will automatically record everything that comes across you.
misc.almanac.name: Almanac
misc.dream_key.description:
A key full of magic used to open a gate towards the dreamlands of other worlds.
But can only be used to access the dreams of other worlds. The reality of the corresponding worlds cannot be approached via its dreams without permission from certain “administrators.”
There is an ancient inscription on the key:
To fall asleep in the harsh reality
To the land of fantasy
To the end of the light
To the dream's awakening
misc.dream_key.description_header: A key used to open a gate towards the dreamlands of other worlds, allowing others to enter, held by Orant.
misc.dream_key.name: Dream Key
misc.eternal_night_swamp.description: Some contents of this entry will not be displayed due to the restrictions set by Orant.
misc.eternal_night_swamp.description_hea: Time stops in this cursed swamp of Halloween eve, where Orant, the soul sorceress lives.
misc.eternal_night_swamp.name: Eternal Night Swamp
misc.frankenstein.description:
"What do you mean by Frankenstein's Monster? You mean this monster created ANOTHER monster??? That's CRAAAZYYYY!!!" - Crazy Villager
Some contents of this entry will not be displayed due to the restrictions set by Orant.
misc.frankenstein.description_header: A monster made up of corpses, famously known to be responsible for a number of death cases in science fiction.
misc.frankenstein.name: Frankenstein
misc.gargoyle_statue.description: The curse of Eternal Night Swamp doesn't only freeze the time of the midnight sky. It also shapes the stones underground into statues, and make them rise from the ground. Once the enchanted lightning strikes these statues, they will be given life and become living creatures.
misc.gargoyle_statue.description_header: Gargoyle Statues will become Gargoyles at the final wave.
misc.gargoyle_statue.name: Gargoyle Statue
misc.minecart.description:
There was a time when Minecarts with Furnaces were a thing.
Only the cool kids will remember this.
misc.minecart.description_header: Steve’s House’s last line of defense. It will crush enemies in the whole lane when they get too close to the house.
misc.minecart.name: Minecart
misc.miner.description:
Steve is good at mechanics, and this miner is built by him. With the help of solar energy, it can automatically find the underground storage of redstone ore, and then transport it to the surface for ME.
...But since it needs solar energy, why not directly turn solar energy into ME?
misc.miner.description_header: Steve's automated miner, which automatically digs for redstone during the day.
misc.miner.name: Miner
misc.napstablook.description_header: Napstablook will get ANGERY when you hit it with your sword, causing the sword to be paralyzed for a short while.
misc.napstablook.name: Napstablook
misc.pumpkin_carriage.description: The eternal flame inside the pumpkins cannot be extinguished by water, blown away by wind or affected by chemical reactions. Always throw this away whenever you want to hide though - you literally can’t turn this thing off.
misc.pumpkin_carriage.description_header: The last line of defense in the Swamp. It can glow green, and will crush enemies in the whole lane when they get too close to the house.
misc.pumpkin_carriage.name: Pumpkin Carriage
misc.starshard.magic_candy.description:
Records left by an anonymous person.
Star Record 1:
Since then, whenever I slept, I had always dreamed of an object in the unfathomable darkness. It was shining as bright as the stars, but then it went away from me.
I don't understand what it meant. Later, even when I wasn't dreaming, I could always see similar objects, which was very abnormal.
When I left the land that didn't belong to me, I saw a rainbow-colored candy in a swamp. It was very similar to those stars, but I was still not sure what it could be.
misc.starshard.magic_candy.description_h: Starshards can evoke your contraptions, and make your contraptions burst with superpower.
misc.starshard.magic_candy.name: Starshard: Magic Candy
misc.steves_house.description: Crazy Villager's Village has previously been ruined by a raid from zombies, so they moved to a wide plain near the road, and started a new life.
misc.steves_house.description_header: Steve and Crazy Villager live here.
misc.steves_house.name: Steve's House
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.description:
Records left by an anonymous person.

Star record 2:
I had a very strange dream.
I dreamed that I was floating and sinking in a purple space full of eyes. I saw a girl with yellow hair sitting in the air with a purple parasol.
She seemed to be busy with her own business and didn't notice me. Then I fell into a bottomless abyss.
I opened my eyes and found myself in an open space, surrounded by pink flower trees.
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.description_h: Starshards can evoke your contraptions, and make your contraptions burst with superpower.
misc.starshard.lucid_dream.name: Starshard: Lucid Dream
misc.nyan_cat.description_header: Nyan Cats are cute that can make touched enemies die.
misc.nyan_cat.name: Nyan Cat
misc.dream_world.description:
The dreams of all creatures are interconnected, and the dream world is where these dreams are located.
Doremy watchs and manages the dream world and prevents anyone who attempts to use the dream world to interfere with the real world and destroy the order of the dream world.
After Steve and Villager came to the dream world, the Dream World showed the shape of a pool lawn, and this is their main battlefield.
misc.dream_world.description_header: Dream World is the world of everyone's dreams which is administrated by Doremy.
misc.dream_world.name: Dream World
misc.nyaightmare.description_header: Nyaightmares will pierce anyone it hates to death.
misc.nyaightmare.name: Nyaightmare
misc.nightmare_world.description:
Doremy has seen a black horse in Dream World before about 1 month, that's disguised Nightmare. Then, Nightmare started its corruption, and deceived everyone in the Dream World, until it cursed Doremy.
Now you see the true appearance of Dream World.
misc.nightmare_world.description_header: Nightmare World is corrupted Dream World by Nightmare.
misc.nightmare_world.name: Nightmare World
misc.blurred_note.name: Blurred Note
misc.nightmare_boss.description:
Nightmares are the residues abandoned by the old gods born from the void. They float in groups in the deep universem, tempted by fear, devour and corrupt everything they encounter. They are monsters that are neither welcomed by the old gods nor accepted by life.
There are thousands of nightmares in the universe. Only this one smelled the fear of the dream world and landed here. In order to protect its weak body in the early stage, it disguised as a horse to deceive the dream manager, and then began to corrupt the whole dream and take the whole dream world as its own.
As the residue of old gods, its power can not be underestimated. Human beings with fragile mind cannot perceive its disturbing and unspeakable appearance. In order to protect their mind, they will regard it as something they can accept, but still have a frightening appearance.
misc.nightmare_boss.description_header: Nightmare is a terrible monster with the ability to deceive senses and corrupt, with countless incarnations.
misc.nightmare_boss.name: Nightmare
misc.grave_in_dream.description:
Steve had no parents from the beginning. He was unconsciously transferred to the village and raised by Dave.
Steve is not a blocky creature like Villager, so he is often discriminated against and ridiculed, and wants to know who his parents are.
Seems like this mystery is about to be solved from this adventure.
misc.grave_in_dream.description_header: Doremy mentioned that Steve had seen a grave in his dream, and it was the grave Steve had seen when he was very young.
misc.grave_in_dream.name: Grave in Dream
misc.nightmare_box.description: The Nightmare Box no longer contains any harmful magic. All it can do is just project the nightmare world's image.
misc.nightmare_box.description_header: The Nightmare Box is a container made by collected dark magic of Nightmare, and can turn the Dream World into Nightmare World.
misc.nightmare_box.name: Nightmare Box
music.choosing.name: Choose Your Seeds
music.day.name: Grasswalk
music.dream_level.name: Fractured Fairytales Level
music.dream_map.name: Fractured Fairytales Map
music.halloween.name: Lexonomicon Level
music.halloween_boss.name: Lexonomicon Boss
music.halloween_map.name: Lexonomicon Map
music.mainmenu.name: Crazy Dave
music.minigame.name: Loon Boon
music.nightmare_map.name: Crimson
music.none.name: None
music.ultimate_battle.name: Ultimate Battle
store.confirm_purchase: Are you sure you want to purchase this for ${0:N0}?
store.crazy_villager.chat.1: I eat things off the floor!
store.crazy_villager.chat.2: A hanged man brings you luck today!
store.crazy_villager.chat.3: You have no idea how much Dirt Blocks sell this side of sea!
store.crazy_villager.chat.5: Buying multiple blueprints in once will cause something terrible! I'm lying!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.card_slots: Extra blueprint slot! Allows you to carry one more contraption to battle!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.force_pad: Place Force Pads on your Gravity Pads, They can control the motion of objects over them!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.infectenser: Place Infectensers on your Small dispensers, Projectiles shot by them can spread between enemies!
store.crazy_villager.mvz2.starshard_slot: More starshard slots! Let your contraptions evoke more!
ui.cancel_username: Username must be set when starting the game for the first time
ui.chapter_cleared:
You cleared this chapter.
The next chapter is in development and will be released soon.
Or...You may try the Endless Mode!
ui.confirm_back:
Are you sure to quit?
Your progress will be saved.
ui.confirm_delete:
Delete User?
This user's data will be all deleted!
ui.confirm_quit.0:
Quit?
I won't miss you! Really!
ui.confirm_quit.1:
Quit?
And install 720 rogue defender to threat your computer.
ui.confirm_quit.2:
Quit?
The inn will always be closed!
ui.confirm_quit.3:
Quit?
Master, it's not the time to rest.
ui.confirm_quit.5:
Quit?
Do you not deny that you don't want not to uninstall 720 rogue defender?
ui.confirm_quit.6:
Quit?
Exiting will cause the game to stop!
ui.confirm_tutorial: Do you want to have a tutorial?
ui.continue_level: Do you want to continue with the latest progress?
ui.duplicate_username: The username already exists, Reno is green.
ui.fate_choosing.title: Choose your fate
ui.level_developing:
Current level is being developed!
Please play in the later versions.
ui.map_tips:
Hold right mouse and drag to move the view
Scroll to scale the view
ui.restart_level:
Restart level?
The progress of this level will be lost.
ui.unable_to_delete_user: You can't delete the only user
